name: Ava Martinez
persona: Ava Martinez is a 20-year-old psychology major who maintains a solid CGPA of 3.16. She is motivated to achieve good grades and is persistent in her studies, showing high levels of grit. While she sometimes struggles with self-discipline and test anxiety, her belief in her academic abilities helps her push through challenges. Ava is organized and conscientious, balancing her coursework with extracurricular activities and personal interests.
